医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
吸食大麻与青少年大脑皮层变薄有关根据圣贾斯汀大学研究人员和蒙特利尔大学医学院教授 Graciela Pineyro 和 Tomas Paus 最近领导的一项研究，吸食大麻可能会导致青少年大脑皮层变薄。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Cannabis-use-linked-to-thinning-cerebral-cortex-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Cannabis-use-linked-to-thinning-cerebral-cortex-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d501469-042d-4663-b039-b64ec56a72d3 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 13:29:12 -0400 Cannabis use linked to thinning cerebral cortex in adolescents
限制快餐店与减少儿童肥胖有关兰卡斯特大学领导的研究表明，限制新快餐店数量的规划政策可以减少超重和肥胖儿童的数量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Restricting-fast-food-outlets-linked-to-decreased-childhood-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Restricting-fast-food-outlets-linked-to-decreased-childhood-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=803b9373-c4c2-48e6-a88d-b3cf39bffdb0 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 13:22:21 -0400 Restricting fast-food outlets linked to decreased childhood obesity
研究显示睡眠不足会损害学习能力十月的最后一个周日，我们会将时钟调慢一小时，这可能会暂时扰乱某些人的睡眠模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Sleep-deprivation-impairs-learning-powered-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Sleep-deprivation-impairs-learning-powered-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43c9344c-ca39-44c4-9836-49fab694b922 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 13:09:00 -0400 Sleep deprivation impairs learning abilities, research shows
TET2 通路的突破性发现为靶向血癌治疗打开了大门大约 30% 的骨髓恶性肿瘤患者的某种名为 tet 甲基胞嘧啶双加氧酶 2 (TET2) 的基因发生突变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Groundwriting-findings-on-TET2-pathway-open-doors-for-targeted-blood-cancer-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Groundwriting-findings-on-TET2-pathway-open-doors-for-targeted-blood-cancer-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4234f97a-4fb9-4653-a9ab-e8034ce5b21d Wed, 23 Oct 2024 12:49:42 -0400 Groundbreaking findings on TET2 pathway open doors for targeted blood cancer treatments
许多脊髓灰质炎幸存者面临终生的迟发效应尼娜·班达里 (Neena Bhandari) 写道，脊髓灰质炎幸存者面临着鲜为人知的疾病后期影响，但他们却被忽视了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Many-polio-survivors-face-lifelong-late-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Many-polio-survivors-face-lifelong-late-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd5bb34a-3b70-4ffe-baec-9da26771478e Wed, 23 Oct 2024 12:41:42 -0400 Many polio survivors face lifelong late effects
1 型糖尿病患者体重管理降糖药物处方数量增加从 2010 年到 2023 年，GLP-1RA 和 SGLT2 抑制剂治疗 1 型糖尿病的处方量不断增加，特别是对于患有肥胖和心肾风险的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Rise-in-weight-management-glucose-lowering-drug-prescriptions-in-type-1-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Rise-in-weight-management-glucose-lowering-drug-prescriptions-in-type-1-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43bb0a46-7504-4df1-8c4a-096b0564d2b0 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 11:54:00 -0400 Rise in weight-management glucose-lowering drug prescriptions in type 1 diabetes patients
女性口腔健康对整体健康的重要性女性的口腔健康不仅仅是美丽的笑容，它是整体健康的一个经常被忽视的重要方面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/The-importance-of-womens-oral-health-in-overall-wellbeing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/The-importance-of-womens-oral-health-in-overall-wellbeing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a644bd40-7cff-42fa-9d4b-1f1c10a0b8e8 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 10:53:00 -0400 The importance of women's oral health in overall wellbeing
人工智能工具可改善女性的产妇护理结果一项大型研究回顾发现，在使用人工智能和其他临床软件工具的情况下，女性更有可能在怀孕期间得到良好的护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/AI-tools-improve-maternity-care-outcomes-for-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/AI-tools-improve-maternity-care-outcomes-for-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb5a97be-f127-4482-be12-dc3446f7e396 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 10:41:35 -0400 AI tools improve maternity care outcomes for women
新研究将 SHAAKE 确定为关键震荡指标脑震荡研究人员发现了一种新的脑震荡迹象，可以识别高达 33% 的未确诊脑震荡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/New-research-identizes-SHAAKE-as-key-concussion-indicator.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/New-research-identizes-SHAAKE-as-key-concussion-indicator.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2181f43-ee83-4a7d-962a-e869ffece403 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 10:06:38 -0400 New research identifies SHAAKE as key concussion indicator
研究表明脱水与 IRONMAN 运动员肌肉痉挛有关当运动员准备潜入夏威夷水域参加 10 月 26 日 IRONMAN 世界锦标赛第一部分比赛时，他们可能需要额外注意体内的水。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Study-links-deHydration-to-muscle-cramps-in-IRONMAN-athletes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Study-links-deHydration-to-muscle-cramps-in-IRONMAN-athletes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a021beb2-202b-4396-8bd8-d312c5b9de21 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 09:54:44 -0400 Study links dehydration to muscle cramps in IRONMAN athletes
